name: bnnlm

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, cnvc))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ Ban, c0 ∈ NrmMod, c0 ∈ NrmVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cnlm))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ NrmVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmVec → c0 ∈ NrmMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnvc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cnlm))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ NrmVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmVec → c0 ∈ NrmMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cnlm))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ban → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmVec → c0 ∈ NrmMod)

comment: A Banach space is a normed module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
